metadata.title: USN-3815-1 -- gettext vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that gettext incorrectly handled certain messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3815-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libasprintf-dev - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 gettext - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 libgettextpo0 - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 gettext-el - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 libasprintf0v5 - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 gettext-base - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 libgettextpo-dev - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 autopoint - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 gettext-doc - 0.19.8.1-6ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
